name: Bay Area Park & Ride Lots
description: Free parking near transit hubs for carpoolers and transit riders
fullDescription: Free parking lots located near major transit hubs and freeway on-ramps throughout the Bay Area, allowing commuters to park and continue their trip via transit, carpool, or vanpool.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free parking at designated lots
- Locations near BART, Caltrain, and bus stations
- Convenient for carpool and vanpool meetups
- Reduces single-occupancy vehicle trips
- Open to all commuters
howToGetIt:
1. Visit 511.org to find Park & Ride lots near you
2. No registration required for most lots
3. Drive to lot and park in designated spaces
4. Continue commute via transit, carpool, or vanpool
5. Some lots may have time limits or overnight restrictions
